description: transparent with multi-colored interior components; hand-set is semi-circular and rests on cradle of same shape; cord is transparent with black, red, green and yellow wiring visible; bottom of base aqua
text: Capitalizing on the standard "Trimline" form made by Western Electric, the Unisonic model is produced in transparent plastic to satisfy the current rage for see-through technology.  Elements are further glamorized with color-coded parts - an index of a growing ease if not infatuation with technology.
title: "Trimline" model 6900 push-button wall phone
